title: BTXZ Archiver Major Update v1.2.0
message:
#BTXZ Archiver 
 --- 
### Changelog

- Introduced v3 core: new core engine providing the next-generation compression/encryption foundation
- Breaking changes: archive format and some CLI flags updated â€” see README for the full migration guide
- README updated with a complete changelog and upgrade instructions
- Dependency and build script updates
- Miscellaneous tooling, packaging, and cross-platform build improvements
